results.title: Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ can cause issues with the gastrointestinal tract and result in @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, @DISEASE_Gas_bloat_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C535647 @@@bloating@@@, or @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@.

citations.NLM: Desai S, Thompson T. Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine. Int J Pharm Compd. 2023 Sep-Oct;27(5):362-366. PMID: 37816179
citations.BibTeX: @article{37816179, title={Compounding Metformin for Use in Functional Medicine.}, author={Desai S and Thompson T}, journal={Int J Pharm Compd}, volume={27}, number={5}, pages={362-366}}

results.title: Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report and Review
results.text_hl: While the @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal@@@ side effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ such as @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, and @DISEASE_Heartburn @DISEASE_MESH:D006356 @@@heartburn@@@ are quite common, one dangerous side effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, is extensively discussed yet rarely reported.

citations.NLM: Ashraf S, Upreti P, Karki S, Khan M, Nasr R. Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report and Review Cureus. 2022 Apr;14(4):e24220. PMID: 35602825
citations.BibTeX: @article{35602825, title={Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report and Review}, author={Ashraf S and Upreti P and Karki S and Khan M and Nasr R}, journal={Cureus}, volume={14}, number={4}, pages={e24220}}

results.title: Unusual Case of Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis in Patient with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: Nevertheless, the intentional increase of his dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to 3000 mg per day led to @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal reactions@@@, including @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, and @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, which caused severe @DISEASE_Dehydration @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@, followed by the development of @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@, one of the results of @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@MALA@@@.

citations.NLM: Hai PD, Thu NT, Phuong LL, Manh NV, Hoa LTV. Unusual Case of Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis in Patient with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Am J Case Rep. 2022 Nov 17;23():e937865. PMID: 36384864
citations.BibTeX: @article{36384864, title={Unusual Case of Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis in Patient with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus}, author={Hai PD and Thu NT and Phuong LL and Manh NV and Hoa LTV}, journal={Am J Case Rep}, volume={23}, pages={e937865}}

results.title: A Rare Case of Metformin Intoxication with Mortal Course
results.text_hl: A 33 year-old female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was admitted to the emergency department, with @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@ after taking 30 tablets of 1000 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Osoydan Satici M, Algin A, Aksel G, Eroglu SE. A Rare Case of Metformin Intoxication with Mortal Course Medeni Med J. 2020;35(2):175-178. PMID: 32733769
citations.BibTeX: @article{32733769, title={A Rare Case of Metformin Intoxication with Mortal Course}, author={Osoydan Satici M and Algin A and Aksel G and Eroglu SE}, journal={Medeni Med J}, volume={35}, number={2}, pages={175-178}}

results.title: Transient Complete Blindness Due to Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis (MALA) Reversed with Hemodialysis
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-associated @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@MALA@@@) is a relatively rare adverse effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Rueda Prada L, Knopps L, Dumic I, Barusya C, Subramanian A, Charokopos A, Zurob AS. Transient Complete Blindness Due to Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis (MALA) Reversed with Hemodialysis Am J Case Rep. 2022 Apr 18;23():e935730. PMID: 35431313
citations.BibTeX: @article{35431313, title={Transient Complete Blindness Due to Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis (MALA) Reversed with Hemodialysis}, author={Rueda Prada L and Knopps L and Dumic I and Barusya C and Subramanian A and Charokopos A and Zurob AS}, journal={Am J Case Rep}, volume={23}, pages={e935730}}

results.title: A Case Report on Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis and Transient Blindness
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ mostly causes @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@gastrointestinal side effects@@@, including @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, @DISEASE_Flatulence @DISEASE_MESH:D005414 @@@flatulence@@@, @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, and @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infections@@@.

citations.NLM: Kalantri P, Sahu A, Kalantri A. A Case Report on Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis and Transient Blindness Cureus. 2020 Jul 21;12(7):e9325. PMID: 32850203
citations.BibTeX: @article{32850203, title={A Case Report on Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis and Transient Blindness}, author={Kalantri P and Sahu A and Kalantri A}, journal={Cureus}, volume={12}, number={7}, pages={e9325}}

results.title: Metformin-associated lactic acidosis: reinforcing learning points.
results.text_hl: We present the case of a man in his early 20s with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@ who presented with @DISEASE_Psychomotor_Agitation @DISEASE_MESH:D011595 @@@agitation@@@, @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@ after ingesting 50-60 g of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@; he developed severe @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ (blood pH 6.93, @CHEMICAL_Bicarbonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001639 @@@bicarbonate@@@ 7.8 mEq/L, @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ 28.0 mEq/L).

citations.NLM: Goonoo MS, Morris R, Raithatha A, Creagh F. Metformin-associated lactic acidosis: reinforcing learning points. BMJ Case Rep. 2020 Sep 2;13(9):. PMID: 32878828
citations.BibTeX: @article{32878828, title={Metformin-associated lactic acidosis: reinforcing learning points.}, author={Goonoo MS and Morris R and Raithatha A and Creagh F}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={13}, number={9}}

results.title: Osmolar-gap in the setting of metformin-associated lactic acidosis
results.text_hl: Forty-five years' old @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type II diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ presented to emergency with a two-day history of @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, watery @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, and mild @DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal discomfort@@@.

citations.NLM: Elshafei MN, Alamin M, Mohamed MFH. Osmolar-gap in the setting of metformin-associated lactic acidosis Medicine (Baltimore). 2020 Oct 9;99(41):e22492. PMID: 33031284
citations.BibTeX: @article{33031284, title={Osmolar-gap in the setting of metformin-associated lactic acidosis}, author={Elshafei MN and Alamin M and Mohamed MFH}, journal={Medicine (Baltimore)}, volume={99}, number={41}, pages={e22492}}

results.title: Severe metabolic acidosis due to massive metformin overdose in a man: a case report
results.text_hl: Following a suicide attempt with an @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, he experienced symptoms such as @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@ and @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Manouchehri A, Rashidian H, Zakariaei Z. Severe metabolic acidosis due to massive metformin overdose in a man: a case report Oxf Med Case Reports. 2023 May;2023(5):omad049. PMID: 37260725
citations.BibTeX: @article{37260725, title={Severe metabolic acidosis due to massive metformin overdose in a man: a case report}, author={Manouchehri A and Rashidian H and Zakariaei Z}, journal={Oxf Med Case Reports}, volume={2023}, number={5}, pages={omad049}}

results.title: Life-Threatening Acidosis With Metformin and Dapagliflozin Combination Therapy: A Case Report
results.text_hl: However, @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@ can be life-threatening when @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@ is used as a combination therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Our @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was a 64-year-old male, with a history of well-controlled @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@, admitted with @<m>DISEASE_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@ and @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@ for several days.

citations.NLM: Gupta S, Mohta A, Temitope S. Life-Threatening Acidosis With Metformin and Dapagliflozin Combination Therapy: A Case Report Cureus. 2023 Feb;15(2):e35497. PMID: 37007332
citations.BibTeX: @article{37007332, title={Life-Threatening Acidosis With Metformin and Dapagliflozin Combination Therapy: A Case Report}, author={Gupta S and Mohta A and Temitope S}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={2}, pages={e35497}}
